bossDialog: (Hanging from invisible strings above the treasure hoard, the Marionette twitches to life as you approach, its painted smile turning sinister as it reaches for weapons hidden among the gold!)
(The Marionette suddenly goes limp, then jerks upright with renewed vigor as spectral strings pull it into an impossible combat stance. Whatever controls this puppet clearly means business!)
My strings may be pulled by another, but your fate is in MY hands now, little thief!

cardBonuses.3: Your creatures have a 2% chance to take another turn.
cardBonuses.6: Your creatures have a 2% chance to take another turn.
cardBonuses.9: Your creatures have a 2% chance to take another turn.

master.dialog: Marionettes may seem like mere puppets, but the strings that control them connect to powers beyond your understanding! They dance between life and death with uncanny grace, and their painted smiles hide deadly intent. My Marionettes move to my rhythm, and today, they'll dance your creatures right into their graves!
master.name: Phantril

name: Marionette
